text: Ma! He's Making Eyes at Me is a 1940 American comedy film directed by Harold D. Schuster and written by Charles Grayson and Edmund Hartmann. The film stars Tom Brown, Constance Moore, Richard Carle, Anne Nagel, Jerome Cowan, Elisabeth Risdon and Fritz Feld. The film was released on March 15, 1940, by Universal Pictures. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Tom Brown as Tommy Shaw *Constance Moore as Connie Curtiss *Richard Carle as C. J. Woodbury *Anne Nagel as Miss Lansdale *Jerome Cowan as Ted Carter *Elisabeth Risdon as Minerva *Fritz Feld as Forsythe *Larry Williams as Joe Porter *Frank Mitchell as Frank *Vivien Fay as Vivien *Marie Greene as Marie ==References== ==External links== * Category:1940 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1940 comedy films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Harold D. Schuster Category:American black-and-white films
title: Ma! He's Making Eyes at Me (film)
